alert.note: Alert for Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Kleberg Islands; Nueces Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued November 19 at 2:42AM CST until November 20 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK NOW IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM CST THIS MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON... ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 3 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Dangerous rip currents expected. * WHERE...Aransas Islands, Kleberg Islands, Nueces Islands and Calhoun Islands Counties. * WHEN...From 6 AM CST this morning through Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Rip currents can sweep even the most experienced swimmers away from shore into deeper water. These rip currents can become life-threatening to anyone entering the surf.
info.instruction: Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.

area.areaDesc: Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Kleberg Islands; Nueces Islands
